## functionChain() function

Chain a list of functions, supplied by \[ object, method name, args \], and return on the first one that returns the failValue. If none return the failValue, return the successValue. This is an internal method.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function functionChain(successValue: any, failValue: any, fns: Array<Array<any>>): any;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  successValue | any |  |
|  failValue | any |  |
|  fns | Array&lt;Array&lt;any&gt;&gt; |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

any
